resources.string: For every action there is a Simple Reaction!

Simple Reaction Studio was founded by me, Matthew Aidukas. I am a current Computer Science Major and over all science enthusiast. Simple Reaction Studio is a way for me to show people around the world my ideas and creations. I have spent years learning various programming languages and software tools, and have decided to put my knowledge to use. My projects include android applications, video game modifications and design, web design, and digital art.

I started a small studio called Reackt Studio, back in 2012, as an identity to my web ideas and design. In 2013, I got evolved into various tools, such as Android SDK, Skyrim Creation Kit, and Visual Studio, and decided to take on more serious projects and also a new name, and then Simple Reaction was born.
Simple Reaction Studio will continue to grow with every project. Just like any artist, my next design becomes sharper, cleaner, more detailed, and ever more creative.
The ACM website was built using the Wordpress package, along with vairous plugins and custom coding, such as a self built paypal form for membership signups.
A basic converter for Binary, Decimal, Hexidecimal, and Octal Values.
Information on the basic workings of logic gates.

Skyrim Book Masters Book and Quest Mod

" This mod allow you to meet a new friend Artius. A Master Scribe in the Master Book Guild, Artius tells you a little bit about his life and the orgins of the Book Masters. Hiding from the chaos in Skyrum, Artius has taken refuge in the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun...
